means: （中等、专科学校或大学的）二年级学生

sentence.Network_en: He is in his sophomore year.
You see, I am a sophomore and Miss Yang is a junior.
sentence.Network_cn: 你瞧, 我是2年级的,杨小姐是三年级的.

yesterday , the sophomore student Loop ( pseudonym ) said that he had been " sold " the good of the rounds .昨日，大二学生圈圈（化名)说，自己已经被“卖”了好几轮了。
...他在新生赛季选择成为红衫球员并已经与球队一起训练了一个赛季,以此类推,红衫大二生,redshirt sophomore,实际上应该是一名大三学生,而这之后通常就不会使用红衫大三大四生,取而代之的是四年级大三生,four.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: perhaps from earlier sophumer, from sophum, sophom (obsolete variants of sophism) + -er

entry.def: A sophomore is a student in the second year of college or high school.

means.word_mean: 1. used of the second year in United States high school or college;
